name: ElasticLoadBalancerAttachment
description: Attaches an Elastic Load Balancing load balancer to an AWS OpsWorks layer that you specify.

properties.name: ElasticLoadBalancerName
properties.description: Elastic Load Balancing load balancer name.

properties.name: LayerId
properties.description: The AWS OpsWorks layer ID that the Elastic Load Balancing load balancer will be attached to.
